question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the 19th floor balcony. Is the destination within sight at your current location? If yes, where is the destination in the view?  
choose:  
A. The balcony on the 19th floor is currently located in the center of my field of view.  
B. The balcony on the 19th floor is currently located on the right side of my field of view.  
C. The balcony on the 19th floor is currently located in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
D. The balcony on the 19th floor is not within my field of view.  
E. The balcony on the 19th floor is currently located on the left side of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: The initial position shows a view of the city and buildings, but the 19th floor balcony is not visible within the current field of view. The perspective does not include close-up details of specific floors or balconies.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 1)]
Option: D
Reason: At the initial position (00:00-00:01), the camera provides a wide, distant view of a city skyline with multiple buildings. From this perspective, it is impossible to distinguish individual floors or specific balconies on any building. The 19th-floor balcony is not within the field of view at this initial, high-level vantage point. The provided answer correctly identifies this.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: D; Reason: The initial position shows a view of the city and buildings, but the 19th floor balcony is not visible within the current field of view. The perspective does not include close-up details of specific floors or balconies.
